entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 10. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 10 April 2023
